author: psharples
msg: More improvements to the conformance tests, mainly making sure that they all run clean and don't leave any widgets in wookie after they have run. (which means you can run the tests multiple times without them failing)

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5080: Fixed camel-jt400 to use correct parameter length in case the value is longer than the parameter length. Thanks to Joao Anacleto for the patch.

author: sinaci
msg: - CORS support for all Contenthub resources + CNN Crawler.
- Default Solr index of Contenthub has been improved.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5080: Fixed camel-jt400 to use correct parameter length in case the value is longer than the parameter length. Thanks to Joao Anacleto for the patch.
